title: Study — JavaScript + Mathematics — 2025-09-04
brief: Warm up on today’s topic. Read the brief, then solve the 2-minute task.

exercise.title: Two-minute arrays task
exercise.instructions: Write a function sum(arr) that returns the sum of numbers; [] -> 0.
exercise.answerKey: Use reduce or loop; return 0 for empty array.

acceptance.prompt: Write a function sum(arr) that returns the sum of numbers; [] -> 0.
